upload.title: Import Transactions
upload.subtitle: Add new CSV/Excel files to your accounting
upload.detectingStructure: Automatic detection of structure and columns
upload.selectAccountDescription: Please select the account associated with this CSV file before continuing.
upload.importSuccessDescription: {{count}} transaction(s) have been added from {{sheets}} sheet(s)
upload.importSuccessCSV: {{count}} transaction(s) have been added to your accounting
upload.supportedFormatsDescription: The system automatically detects the structure of your CSV/Excel files. It identifies Date, Label and Amount columns without relying on headers.
upload.acceptedFormats: Accepted formats: CSV (semicolon or comma separator), Excel (.xlsx, .xls)
upload.excelMultiSheet: • For Excel, you can select multiple sheets and associate them with different accounts.

edition.title: Edition
edition.noData: No data matches the selected filters.
edition.noDataHint: Try modifying the source or category filters to display results.
edition.cleanConfirm: Do you want to clean all CSV files by removing duplicates and fixing inconsistencies? This operation is irreversible.
edition.cleanSuccess: Cleaning completed: {{cleaned}} duplicate(s) removed and {{fixed}} inconsistency(ies) fixed in {{files}} file(s)
edition.autoCategorizeNoSuggestions: No category suggestions found for uncategorized rows

settings.title: Settings
settings.subtitle: Configure your accounting application
settings.accountManagementSubtitle: Add, modify or delete your bank accounts
settings.dataFolderDescription: Location where your CSV files are stored
settings.autoCategorizationDescription: Rebuild learning statistics from all already categorized rows in your CSV files. This operation may take a few moments.
settings.rebuildConfirm: Rebuild auto-categorization statistics from CSV data? This operation will replace current stats.
settings.rebuildSuccess:
Statistics rebuilt successfully!
{{processed}} rows processed
{{stats}} unique words in statistics
settings.resetStatsDescription: Completely reset learning statistics (deletes all data)
settings.resetConfirm: Are you sure you want to reset auto-categorization statistics? This action is irreversible.
settings.licenseText: MIT License - Free to use and modify

dropzone.title: Drag and drop your CSV/Excel files here
dropzone.subtitle: or click to browse your files

columnMapping.title: Column Mapping Configuration
columnMapping.instruction2: You must select at least one column for amounts (Debit, Credit or Combined Debit/Credit)
columnMapping.instruction3: If you have separate Debit and Credit columns, select them separately
columnMapping.instruction4: If you have a single column with positive and negative values, select "Combined Debit/Credit"
columnMapping.warningNoCredit: No Credit column selected. Credit values will be 0 for all transactions.
columnMapping.errorDateRequired: A Date column must be selected
columnMapping.errorLibelleRequired: A Label column must be selected
columnMapping.errorAmountRequired: At least one Debit, Credit or Debit/Credit column must be selected
columnMapping.autoDetected: Balance automatically detected from account history

excelSheet.title: Excel Sheet Selection
excelSheet.description: Select the sheets to import and associate each sheet with an account.
excelSheet.allHaveAccounts: All sheets have an associated account
excelSheet.missingAccounts: Please select an account for the following sheets: {{sheets}}
